name: The Scotian Fox: Early Demo
description:
The Scotian Fox is a Action-Packed 2D Platformer game.

In the Scotian Fox, you play as Hali-Fox as he goes along his way trying to save all of the Holiday's as they have been cancelled due to Doctor Isiah. 

This build is a pre-demo build which I have decided to release early so that I could get some feed-back before the release date of the full demo on Easter-Weekend. 

- Make Sure to follow our Facebook page, so that you can keep up-to-date as well be aware of when the KickStarter / Demo is released :) 

https://www.facebook.com/Scotian-Wolf
